Reviews.Title: Grat price, great features
Reviews.Author: miguel martinez
Reviews.Content: Unlocked phone, very usefull. Almost same features than S3. Very fast to find wifi network, and grat if your choice is to have google accounts. Smart phone.

Reviews.Title: This US warranty is not what you might think it is
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I wrote this vendor to ask about the warranty. No answer. Then I called. This is what I understood: it is their warranty (not Samsung) and valid only for 3 months. And they are offering the same phone with different descriptions (at least 7 that I could count) and prices.I also wrote to several other vendors that didn't mention the warranty on their ad. Almost all of them answered but  none of those phones has a US warranty.My advise is that if you want to buy this phone unlocked and w/o contract, get one from Google Play and pay (only) $400 for a phone with a real US warranty.Hope this keeps someone from taking a bad decision.
